text:
@realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse The Coronavirus has
👉exposed the Republican plan to repeal the ACA without a replacement as absurd
👉Imagine 21 million people losing coverage now

Affordable Care Act: Amid coronavirus, never more popular, threatened or necessary: #ACAProtectsOurNation
